body:
### Welcome to XPERT's Homepage.
XPERT is a tool for identifying cross-browser issues in web applications.
Currently we are working on re-implementing the tool to meet the terms of licensing and contract from Fujitsu labs. The current development is taking place in a private github repository and would be released as an open source tool at the end of Fall 2012. 

For updates on the development of this project, please watch this page or email @shauvik to be added to a notification mailing list.



### Experimental Data for ICSE 2013
#### Subjects used for the study 
* Organizer
* GrantaBooks
* DesignTrust
* DivineLife
* SaiBaba
* Breakaway
* Conference
* Fisherman
* Valleyforge
* UniMelb
* Konqueror
* UBC
* BMVBS
* StarWars

Click on the subject name to view the report.


### Authors and Contributors
* Shauvik Roy Choudhary (@shauvik)
* Mukul Prasad
* Alessandro Orso (@alexorso)

### Publications
A detailed list of publications on Cross-browser testing can be found at the following pages:
* Shauvik's academic homepage: http://www.cc.gatech.edu/~shauvik
* Mukul's research webpage: http://www.flacp.fujitsulabs.com/~mprasad

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with XPERT? Check out the documentation or contact @shauvik and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
